service.name: calendar
service.description: Universal scheduling intelligence system that enables time-aware workflows and cross-scenario temporal coordination

api.description: Calendar REST API for event management and scheduling

ui.description: Professional calendar interface with week/month views

postgres.purpose: Event storage, user schedules, recurring patterns

qdrant.purpose: AI-powered semantic event search and scheduling intelligence

notification-hub.purpose: Event reminders and schedule change notifications

ollama.purpose: Natural language processing for chat interface
ollama.fallback: Basic command parsing without AI enhancement

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o calendar-api .

steps.name: show-urls

develop.description: Start calendar system with API and UI servers

steps.name: setup-database
steps.run: resource-postgres content add --database calendar_system --init || echo 'Database may already exist'
steps.description: Create calendar database if not exists

steps.name: start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server with auth and notification integration

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && VROOLI_LIFECYCLE_MANAGED=true npm run dev

steps.name: show-urls
stop-ui
steps.run: pkill -f "scenarios/calendar.*npm run dev" || true; pkill -f "scenarios/calendar.*vite" || true; sleep 1; pkill -9 -f "scenarios/calendar.*vite" 2>/dev/null || true
